document_data.name: Blakkal Mord
document_data.mainbody: '''Blakkal Mord''' was a leather-worker and council member who lived in [[High Dale]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Mord was a very able warrior in High Dale and a secret agent of the [[Cult of the Dragon]]. When in [[1358 DR]] a secret [[Zhent]] occupation army occupied the dale, Blakkal was a member of the [[Council of the High Dale]]. He hated all outsiders. Constable [[Heladar Longspear]] believed him a sinister individual.
